title: You Give Me Fever: Why Girls Who Love Pro Sports Should Have an Equal Voice in Them
text:
Published By: Huffington Post Sports - Today 
It's October and baseball fever has kept me turning at night. For years I've had strong feelings about this game, and about girls and women'...
